privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: / プライバシーポリシー
privacy.intro: Kohta Kouchi (hereinafter referred to as "the Operator") establishes this Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as "this Policy") regarding the handling of users' personal information on this website (hereinafter referred to as "the Service").

sections.title: Article 1 (Personal Information)
sections.content: "Personal information" refers to "personal information" as defined in the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, and refers to information about living individuals that can identify a specific individual by the name, date of birth, address, telephone number, contact information, and other descriptions contained in such information, as well as data such as appearance, fingerprints, and voice prints, and information that can identify a specific individual from such information alone (personal identification information).

sections.title: Article 2 (Method of Collecting Personal Information)
sections.content: The Operator may ask for personal information such as name and email address when Users use the contact form of the Service. The Service also uses Google Analytics to analyze access, and automatically collects information such as Users' behavioral history using technologies such as cookies.

sections.title: Article 3 (Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information)
sections.content:
The purposes for which the Operator collects and uses personal information are as follows:

1. To respond to inquiries
2. To analyze and improve the usage status of the Service
3. To notify changes to the terms and conditions of the Service
4. For purposes incidental to the above purposes

sections.title: Article 4 (Change of Purpose of Use)
sections.content: The Operator shall change the purpose of use of personal information only when it is reasonably recognized that the purpose is related to the purpose before the change. If the purpose of use is changed, the Operator shall notify Users or publicly announce the changed purpose on this website in a manner prescribed by the Operator.

sections.title: Article 5 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
sections.content:
The Operator will not provide personal information to third parties without the prior consent of Users, except in the following cases. However, cases permitted by the Act on the Protection of Personal Information and other laws and regulations are excluded.

1. When it is necessary to protect the life, body, or property of a person and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
2. When it is particularly necessary to improve public health or promote the sound growth of children and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
3. When it is necessary to cooperate with a national or local government agency or a person entrusted by such agency in performing affairs prescribed by laws and regulations, and obtaining the consent of the person may hinder the performance of such affairs
4. When the following matters have been notified or publicly announced in advance and the Operator has notified the Personal Information Protection Commission:
   ① The purpose of use includes provision to third parties
   ② Items of data provided to third parties
   ③ Means or methods of provision to third parties
   ④ Stopping the provision of personal information to third parties at the request of the person
   ⑤ Method of accepting requests from the person

sections.title: Article 6 (Disclosure of Personal Information)
sections.content:
When requested by the person to disclose personal information, the Operator shall disclose it to the person without delay. However, if disclosure falls under any of the following, all or part of it may not be disclosed, and if a decision is made not to disclose, the Operator shall notify the person without delay.

1. When there is a risk of harming the life, body, property, or other rights and interests of the person or a third party
2. When there is a risk of significantly hindering the proper implementation of the Operator's business
3. When it would violate other laws and regulations

sections.title: Article 7 (Correction and Deletion of Personal Information)
sections.content: Users may request the Operator to correct, add, or delete (hereinafter referred to as "correction, etc.") personal information held by the Operator if such information is incorrect, in accordance with the procedures prescribed by the Operator. If the Operator receives a request from a User as described in the preceding paragraph and determines that it is necessary to respond to the request, the Operator shall promptly make the correction, etc. of such personal information.

sections.title: Article 8 (Suspension of Use of Personal Information)
sections.content: If the Operator is requested by the person to suspend or delete the use of personal information (hereinafter referred to as "suspension of use, etc.") on the grounds that the personal information is being handled beyond the scope of the purpose of use or that it was obtained by fraudulent means, the Operator shall promptly conduct the necessary investigation. Based on the results of the investigation in the preceding paragraph, if it is determined that it is necessary to respond to the request, the Operator shall promptly suspend the use, etc. of such personal information.

sections.title: Article 9 (Use of Cookies and Similar Technologies)
sections.content: The Service may use cookies and similar technologies. These technologies help the Operator understand the usage status of the Service and contribute to service improvement. Users who wish to disable cookies can do so by changing their web browser settings. However, disabling cookies may prevent Users from using some functions of the Service.

sections.title: Article 10 (Changes to the Privacy Policy)
sections.content: The content of this Policy may be changed without notifying Users, except for matters stipulated separately by laws and regulations or this Policy. Unless otherwise specified by the Operator, the revised Privacy Policy shall become effective from the time it is posted on this website.

sections.title: Article 11 (Contact)
sections.content: For inquiries regarding this Policy, please use the contact form of the Service.
